item.title: NatsuLion Version 0.4
item.description:
Release Notes - NatsuLion - Version 0.4

Notice

From this version, NatsuLion uses keychain to store user's password (NTLN-12). Then the password stored in your plist is no longer needed. So, please remove plist file sitting at $HOME/Library/Preferences/net.physalis.NatsuLion.plist and then launch NatsuLion.

Bug

  • [NTLN-32] - convert entity reference to a normal character in the message view

Improvement

  • [NTLN-7] - expand a message row to show its whole message text if truncated

New Feature

  • [NTLN-3] - make @ a link to the page of user
  • [NTLN-12] - store user passwords in his keychain
  • [NTLN-20] - make refresh interval configurable
  • [NTLN-37] - configuration wizard like feature for the first time launched
  • [NTLN-38] - change sort order to ascending
